item.title: How It's Made : EverydayStem Site
item.description: The Everydaystem blog is seemingly feature rich and aesthetically pleasing website. It would make sense to assume that constructing such a site is both costly and complex but this couldn’t be further from the truth. In this article we explore how the site is constructed, maintained and served.

item.title: Educational Youtube
item.description: Youtube is a remarkable platform. To have free access to so much great quality content is simply unprecedented. We, however, understand that it is incredibly difficult to navigate such a vast sea of information. We get asked from time to time to recommend creators with great content. We thus compiled a list of some hidden gems on the platform that we thought you would enjoy.
